text:
“China chow restaurant” located on sample and riverside,in Coral Springs,Florida was shut down Tuesday after an undercover cop went inside and purchase dog meat, A special menu the restaurant was selling to VIP Customers. It all started after the server gave the dog meat to the wrong customer.The client was disgusted by the dog food. The customer later reported it to coral springs PD, they then setup an undercover operation for two months,that brought “china chow restaurant to justice” saving the life of innocent dogs. They were also slaughtering the dogs in the back of the restaurant, In a sound proof Room.

Coral springs spokes person “David Cunningham” advice civilians to report any suspicions Chinese restaurants to law enforcement.
title: Chinese Restaurant In Coral Springs,Florida Busted For Selling Dog Meat To VIP Customers
